title: 8 People Found After Oklahoma House Fire Died in Murder-Suicide, Police Say
description: Two adults and six children, believed to be members of the same family, were found dead in a home near Tulsa, the police said.
dc:creator: Vimal Patel and Johnny Diaz
media:credit: Ian Maule/Tulsa World, via Associated Press
media:description: Police officers and firefighters at a house fire in Broken Arrow, Okla. where eight people were found dead.
